name: maggic-quality-criteria
title: Maggic Dataset Quality Criteria
description: Quality criteria for datasets created using the MAGGIC feature-set.

criteria.name: validLVEF
criteria.description: Percentage of records that has valid LVEF value
criteria.expression: SELECT count(*) as num_valid FROM dataset WHERE echocardiographs_lvef IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: nyhaCardinality
criteria.description: Having at least 4 different concepts in the dataset for NYHA (nyha_nyha) class
criteria.expression: SELECT count(distinct nyha_nyha) as nyha_count FROM dataset WHERE nyha_nyha IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: smokingStatusCardinality
criteria.description: Having at least 2 different concepts in the dataset for smoking status (smoking_status_smoker) class
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT smoking_status_smoker) AS smoking_status_count FROM dataset WHERE smoking_status_smoker IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: systolicBloodPressureBelowThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with systolic blood pressure average less than 90
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_below_threshold FROM dataset WHERE vital_signs_systolic_blood_pressure_value_p3a_avg < 90 AND vital_signs_systolic_blood_pressure_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: systolicBloodPressureAboveThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with systolic blood pressure average more than 140
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_above_threshold FROM dataset WHERE vital_signs_systolic_blood_pressure_value_p3a_avg > 140 AND vital_signs_systolic_blood_pressure_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: bmiBelowThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with BMI average less than 18.5
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_below_threshold FROM dataset WHERE vital_signs_bmi_value_p3a_avg < 18.5 AND vital_signs_bmi_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: bmiAboveThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with BMI average more than 30
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_above_threshold FROM dataset WHERE vital_signs_bmi_value_p3a_avg > 30 AND vital_signs_bmi_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: creatinineBelowThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with creatinine levels less than 0.6
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_below_threshold FROM dataset WHERE lab_results_creatinine_value_p3a_avg < 0.6 AND lab_results_creatinine_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: creatinineAboveThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with creatinine levels more than 1.5
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_above_threshold FROM dataset WHERE lab_results_creatinine_value_p3a_avg > 1.5 AND lab_results_creatinine_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: urinaryCreatinineBelowThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with urinary creatinine levels less than 40
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_below_threshold FROM dataset WHERE lab_results_urinary_creatinine_value_p3a_avg < 40 AND lab_results_urinary_creatinine_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: urinaryCreatinineAboveThreshold
criteria.description: Percentage of records with urinary creatinine levels more than 300
criteria.expression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_above_threshold FROM dataset WHERE lab_results_urinary_creatinine_value_p3a_avg > 300 AND lab_results_urinary_creatinine_value_p3a_avg IS NOT NULL

criteria.name: plausibleBalancedGender
criteria.description: Checking if percentage of males is between 45-55
criteria.expression: SELECT count(*) as num_males FROM dataset WHERE patient_demographics_gender = 'male'
